channel.title: All Registered Polls for the Folketinget

item.title: Opinion Poll by Voxmeter for 2019-10-07, 30 September–7 October 2019 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• Socialdemokraterne: 46–57 seats
  • Dansk Folkeparti: 12–18 seats
  • Venstre: 40–48 seats
  • Enhedslisten–De Rød-Grønne: 11–15 seats
  • Liberal Alliance: 0–5 seats
  • Alternativet: 4–7 seats
  • Radikale Venstre: 13–19 seats
  • Socialistisk Folkeparti: 13–18 seats
  • Det Konservative Folkeparti: 10–15 seats
  • Kristendemokraterne: 0–4 seats
  • Nye Borgerlige: 0–4 seats
  • Stram Kurs: 0 seats
